name: AMF21 Item Stock
query:
SELECT
    i.item_code
        AS `Item:Link/Item:150`,
    i.item_name
        AS `Name:Link/Item:300`,
    i.item_group
        AS `Group:Link/Item:150`,
    /* Main Stock - AMF21 */
    SUM(
        CASE
            WHEN b.warehouse = 'Main Stock - AMF21'
            THEN b.actual_qty
            ELSE 0
        END
    ) AS `Main Stock - AMF21:Float:120`,
    /* Work In Progress - AMF21 */
    SUM(
        CASE
            WHEN b.warehouse = 'Work In Progress - AMF21'
            THEN b.actual_qty
            ELSE 0
        END
    ) AS `Work In Progress - AMF21:Float:120`,
    /* Quality Control - AMF21 */
    SUM(
        CASE
            WHEN b.warehouse = 'Quality Control - AMF21'
            THEN b.actual_qty
            ELSE 0
        END
    ) AS `Quality Control - AMF21:Float:120`
FROM
    `tabItem` AS i
LEFT JOIN
    `tabBin` AS b
    ON b.item_code = i.item_code
where
    i.disabled = 0
GROUP BY
    i.item_code
ORDER BY
    i.item_code
